Package AbmParser

Class ParserConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbmParser.ParserConfigurer
  • public final class ParserConfigurer
extends java.lang.Object
    Configurer that analysis the configuration file and produces scenarios 1. collects information from the config file 2. instantiates the parsers and scenario processor 3. construct the scenario 4. post processing with scenario processor A user should instantiate a parser confugurer when the GUI needs scenario from input

    • Field Summary

      Json object for internal storage It's the raw json object converted from the config file

        public Scenario parse()
               throws ParserConfigurerException
        Creates a scenario from the json object and launch the parsers It produces scenarios in the following order 1. collects information from the config file 2. instantiates the parsers and scenario processor 3. construct the scenario 4. post processing with scenario processor
